Texts.Eng:
The peaceful Hylotl place great value on ancestral tradition and take great comfort in the arts. While not lovers of violence, they are quite skilled in martial arts and are not to be trifled with.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Start game with Liquid Collection unlocked.
  Charisma: +^green;5^reset;%
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;20^reset;% Ice, +^cyan;12^reset;% Radiation, +^cyan;8^reset;% Poison, +^cyan;15^reset;% Mental

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  In water: +^green;1500^reset; oxygen, +^green;8^reset;% Physical Resistance, Health x^green;1.12^reset;
  Rain grants slight regeneration.
  ^cyan;Swim Boost 1^reset;
  ^red;Deserts, Red Desert^reset; biomes: Defense x^red;0.8^reset;, Health x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Swords: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance when above ^green;75^reset;% health
  Katana Mastery (^green;25^reset;%)

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Electric, -^red;10^reset;% Shadow
